Lectotype : Brazil , Pernambuco : Tapera, 24.X.1927 , P.B. Pickel. The specimen is herein designated as the lectotype in order to stabilize the taxonomy and facilitate further identification of this species. Junior synonym of
Mallocera simplex White, 1853
